title: God of War fans compete to find the worst possible casting for its TV series
text: God of War fans are currently trying to one-up each other with terrible casting choices for the upcoming TV adaptation. It's recently been revealed that the God of War TV show is a step closer to being made after it secured a showrunner.

title: God of War Ragnarok Player Suffers A Heartbreaking Loss To Valkyrie Queen Gna
text: Moments away from victory, a God of War Ragnarok player could not be more unlucky against Valkyrie Queen Gna, one of the hardest fights in the game.

title: God of War Ragnarok Gamer Defeats Fiske With Only Punches At The Highest Difficulty
text: One incredibly skilled God of War Ragnarok player destroys Fiske at the highest difficulty using only punches and the shield.
